name: Spectrum Break
description: Spectrum Break is a synth-infused physics platformer, where you reshape levels with neon light. Blocks in each level float in zero gravity and can be pushed around by the player, causing them to light up in a burst of vibrant color and sound. Light up all blocks to win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 1.6 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or Intel hd graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Intel hd graphics or AMD Radeon HD 6520G Additional Notes: Includes keyboard and gamepad support.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 2 Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: GeForce GTX 760 Additional Notes: Includes keyboard and gamepad support.
